messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many km to Golden Gate Bridge?
Sure—could you let me know the starting location (city, address, or latitude/longitude) you’d like me to measure the distance from to the Golden Gate Bridge?
I don't have that info, sorry.

No problem—just let me know any starting point you’d like to use (even something broad like a city name or ZIP/postal code), and I can give you the approximate distance to the Golden Gate Bridge. If you aren’t sure of your exact coordinates, here are some examples of information that would work:

• A street address (e.g., “1600 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington, DC”)  
• A city and state or city and country (e.g., “Los Angeles, CA” or “Paris, France”)  
• A landmark (e.g., “Times Square, New York”)  
• Latitude/longitude in decimal degrees (e.g., 37.7749 N, 122.4194 W)

Share whichever is easiest, and I’ll calculate the distance for you!
Can you use some tools to figure out my current location?

I’m afraid I don’t have access to your device’s location, IP-based data, or any other way to pinpoint where you are. If you can share at least an approximate starting point—anything from a city name to a nearby landmark or set of coordinates—I’ll gladly calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge for you.
Alright, I'll see if I can figure it out another way. Thanks anyway.
You’re welcome! If you do come up with a starting point—or have any other questions—feel free to reach out. Happy to help anytime.
